channel.title: NPR Programs: Morning Edition
channel.description: Morning Edition takes listeners around the country and the world with multi-faceted stories and commentaries every weekday. Hosts Steve Inskeep, Leila Fadel, Michel Martin and A Martínez bring you the latest breaking news and features to prepare you for the day.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Democrats sweep key races across the country
item.description: Democrats celebrated major victories in key races across the country Tuesday night, winning gubernatorial races in Virginia and New Jersey, as well as New York City's closely watched mayoral race.
item.content:encoded: Democrats celebrated major victories in key races across the country Tuesday night, winning gubernatorial races in Virginia and New Jersey, as well as New York City's closely watched mayoral race.
item.dc:creator: Hosts

item.title: Analyst Larry Sabato talks about Tuesday's election results and what they mean
item.description: NPR's Leila Fadel discusses the issues and influences that defined Tuesday's election wins and losses with University of Virginia political analyst Larry Sabato.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Leila Fadel discusses the issues and influences that defined Tuesday's election wins and losses with University of Virginia political analyst Larry Sabato.
item.dc:creator: Leila Fadel

item.title: Spanberger, Virginia's first woman governor, says she'll defy Trump's 'bad policies'
item.description: Abigail Spanberger, Virginia's first woman governor, says she's ready to push back on President Trump's "bad policies" for the sake of Virginians.
item.content:encoded:
Abigail Spanberger, Virginia's first woman governor, says she's ready to push back on President Trump's "bad policies" for the sake of Virginians.

(Image credit: Win McNamee)
item.dc:creator: Leila Fadel

item.title: Mikie Sherrill says New Jersey voters want 'leadership' in face of Trump's challenges
item.description: Rep. Mikie Sherrill, a former Navy pilot, says voters chose her to lead and address affordability at a time when many New Jersey residents feel challenged by the Trump administration.
item.content:encoded:
Rep. Mikie Sherrill, a former Navy pilot, says voters chose her to lead and address affordability at a time when many New Jersey residents feel challenged by the Trump administration.

(Image credit: Matt Rourke)
item.dc:creator: Obed Manuel

item.title: Democrats had a big night. Here are 5 takeaways from the 2025 elections
item.description: Democrats had a good night, winning major races including governor's races in Virginia and New Jersey and a redistricting ballot measure in California, while also confronting the future of the party.
item.content:encoded:
Democrats had a good night, winning major races including governor's races in Virginia and New Jersey and a redistricting ballot measure in California, while also confronting the future of the party.

(Image credit: Alex Wong)
item.dc:creator: Domenico Montanaro

item.title: Morning news brief
item.description: Democrats win gubernatorial races in Virginia and New Jersey, Zohran Mamdani will be the next mayor of New York City, California voters approve a new congressional map.
item.content:encoded: Democrats win gubernatorial races in Virginia and New Jersey, Zohran Mamdani will be the next mayor of New York City, California voters approve a new congressional map.
item.dc:creator: A Martínez

item.title: Reports of bird flu in farm animals raise concerns about the virus
item.description: Cases of bird flu have been reported in farm animals across the country. While there are no human cases, some are concerned the shutdown and cuts to federal resources have us flying in the dark.
item.content:encoded: Cases of bird flu have been reported in farm animals across the country. While there are no human cases, some are concerned the shutdown and cuts to federal resources have us flying in the dark.
item.dc:creator: Will Stone

item.title: Indiana University facing lawsuit after claims it tried to censor student newspaper
item.description: Indiana University's student newspaper is at the center of a lawsuit by its former advisor who says he was fired by the administration because he stood up against censorship.
item.content:encoded: Indiana University's student newspaper is at the center of a lawsuit by its former advisor who says he was fired by the administration because he stood up against censorship.
item.dc:creator: Ethan Sandweiss

item.title: Democrats win governor's races in New Jersey and Virginia
item.description: Among the first statewide votes since President Trump returned for a second term, two Democrats have won the gubernatorial races in New Jersey and Virginia.
item.content:encoded: Among the first statewide votes since President Trump returned for a second term, two Democrats have won the gubernatorial races in New Jersey and Virginia.
item.dc:creator: Joe Hernandez

item.title: 'We wanna live in peace': Attacks on Palestinian olive harvesters leave them in fear
item.description: The number of Israeli settler attacks on Palestinian olive harvesters is at a five-year high. Groves have been vandalized, and many farmers are too frightened to collect their olives.
item.content:encoded: The number of Israeli settler attacks on Palestinian olive harvesters is at a five-year high. Groves have been vandalized, and many farmers are too frightened to collect their olives.
item.dc:creator: Daniel Estrin
